name: Federal Music Festival
obverse: A lyre, wreath, and piano roll on a cloud inside of an elaborate patchwork design.
obverse_inscriptions: ZUR ERINNERUNG AN DAS EIDGENÖSSISCHE MUSIKFEST
reverse: View of the city of Zurich with coat of arms above.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the federal music festival held in Zurich in 1867.
